string-array.name: india_QuestionSet1
string-array.item: Q 1. Who among the following was the first person to determine the Circumference of the Earth?
Q 2. Which of the following states is the only diamond producing state in India?
Q 3. The Bayyaram mines area, which was recently in news, is located in __?
Q 4. River Luni (Lavanavari river) originates from which among the following ranges?
Q 5. Which one of the following islands is called as ‘rust belt’ of Japan ?
Q 6. People of which among the following countries are also known as Magyars ?
Q 7. Which among the following a line or surface drawn on a map or chart indicates connected points of equal salinity in the ocean?
Q 8. Which among the following mineral is a carbonate of calcium and magnesium?
Q 9. Which among the following can best define the Neolithic Revolution ?
Q 10. What among the following is a partially enclosed body of water along the coast where freshwater from rivers and streams meets and mixes with salt water from the ocean ?
Q 11. The ratio of the partial pressure of water vapor in an air-water mixture to the saturated vapor pressure of water at a given temperature is termed as:
Q 12. Petermann Glacier is located in which among the following?
Q 13. Which among the following states is not covered by the Chhota Nagpur Plateau ?
Q 14. Mahanadi river originates in which among the following states of India?
Q 15. Which of the following mountain ranges in India is known as a young fold mountain range?
Q 16. Soloman Islands are located in__:
Q 17. The pedogenic regime of podzolisation associated with which among the following areas?
Q 18. Which among the following areas are marked by the pedogenic regime of calcification?
Q 19. Which among the following factors play important role in pedogenesis?
Q 20. Which among the following rivers is an example of superimposed drainage system in India?
Q 21. Which among the following country is not bigger than India in terms of total geographical area?
Q 22. What fraction of total geographic area of the world is covered by India?
Q 23. Madagan 2 oil field is located in ___:
Q 24. Pacific Tsunami Warning Center (PTWC) is located at ___:
Q 25. Lower Subansiri Hydro Power project is under development in which state?
Q 26. Chandipur missile test range is located in ___:
Q 27. Pench River Project is located in ___?
Q 28. Castle Naggar heritage site is located in __:
Q 29. Satipati Sampradaya is a tribal community of ____:
Q 30. Catalonia region is located in which country?

string-array.name: india_option_c1
string-array.item: Continental regions with wet-dry climatic regimes

string-array.name: india_answer_set1
string-array.item: Continental regions with wet-dry climatic regimes

Q.7 What was the symbol of first Teerthankar Rishabhdeva ?

Q.17 How many Hymes are there in Rigveda?
Q.18 Gopath brahman is associated with which of these Vedas ?

Q.23 Chandragupta’s migration to South with Bhadra Bhahu is mentioned in which of these scriptures?
Q.26 In which Rock edicts the information of Ashok’s visit to Bouddhgaya is found?

Q.29 Who was the wife of Ashoka ?

string-array.name: india_QuestionSet3
string-array.item: Q.1 Who was victorious in Dasrajan war?
Q.2 What was the name of river Chinab known during vedic period?

Q.5 First mention of four Ashrams is found

Q.7 What do you mean by ‘Bhag and Bali’

Q.9 Who presided the first Buddhist council ?
Q.10 ”Nothing definite can be said about any subject. What is this Jain principal known as?
Q.11 Which state government has recently launched "one family, one job" scheme?
Q.12 National youth day is celebrated every year?
Q.13 India has recently announced the launch of Mission Gaganyaan in December 2021, tell us which country in the world will be doing this?
Q.14 Which country has recently changed its name to Republic of North Macedonia?
Q.15 Who has been awarded the Philip Kotler award recently?
Q.16 Recently, Geeta Gopinath has taken over as Chief Economist of IMF, tell who is the Chief Economist of IMF so far?
Q.17 Recently, the Central Government has announced what percentage of reservation to economically backward upper castes?
Q.18 Recently, who has become the first player to win the Hopman Cup three times?

string-array.name: india_QuestionSet4
string-array.item: Q.1 Which of the following commission was appointed by the Central Government on Union-State relations in 1983?
Q.2 Which of the following taxes are levied by the Union but are collected and appropriated by the states?
Q.3 Which of the following taxes are imposed and collected by the state government?
Q.4 Which of the following tax is levied and collected by the Union government but the proceeds are distributed between the Union and states?
Q.5 Which of the following is levied and collected by the Union government?
Q.6 Which of the article deals with the grants in aid by the Union government to the states?
Q.7 Which of the following article deals with the election of the Vice-president?
Q.8 Who can remove the Vice-President from his office ?
Q.9 The term of office of the Vice-president is as follows?
Q.10 The Vice-president is the ex-officio chairman of the Rajya sabha?
Q.11 Which one of the following article deals with the appointment of the Prime Minister and other ministers?
Q.12 The Prime Minister is appointed by which one of the following?
Q.13 Who among the following shall communicate to the president all the decisions of the council of ministers under article 78?
Q.14 The total number of ministers including the prime ministers shall not exceed-

Q.16 Who among the following appoints the Chief Justice and other Judges of the Supreme Court?
Q.17 Which of the following are the powers of the Supreme Court?
Q.18 Which article of the constitution of India provides the composition and jurisdiction of the Supreme Court of India?

Q.20 Mr. T.S. Thakur is the ...................Chief Justice of India.
Q.21 What is the minimum age to become a member of Lok Sabha?
Q.22 What is the strength of total elected members of 14th Lok Sabha?
Q.23 What is the maximum strength of the Lok Sabha envisaged by the Constitution?
Q.24 How many members are elected in the Lok Sabha from the Union Territories (according to Constitutional provision)
Q.25 During the proclamation of emergency is in operation the term of Lok Sabha may be extended at a time for a period not exceeding:
Q.26 Which feature of Indian Constitution is not taken from American Constitution?
Q.27 Procedure for the amendment of the Constitution is taken form:
Q.28 The concept of Federal System in Indian Constitution is taken from:
Q.29 From which country the concept Fundamental Duties in Indian Constitution is taken?
Q.30 Emergency provisions in Indian Constitution is taken from:

string-array.name: india_option_b4
string-array.item: Excise duties on medical and toilet materials
Two senior most Supreme Court judges

string-array.name: india_option_d4
string-array.item: Depend on the discretion of the President

string-array.name: india_QuestionSet5
string-array.item: Q.1 Directive principles of State Policy is mentioned in …….. of the Indian constitution.

Q.6 Which Article in the Indian Constitution provides for an Election Commission in India?
Q.7 Currently, there are how many members in the Election Commission?
Q.8 What is the tenure of office for the Chief Election Commissioner?
Q.9 For the Election Commission, at the district level, who acts as the district returning officer?
Q.10 Who appoints the Chief Election Commissioner of Election Commission?
Q.11 Which one of the following is true about High courts?
Q.12 At present, how many high courts are there in India?
Q.13 Which one of the following article deals with the appointment of judges?
Q.14 High courts issue writs under article .........
Q.15 The chief justice and other judges of the high courts are appointed by which one of the following?
Q.16 Which is the oldest known system designed for the redressal of citizens grievance?
Q.17 Which was the first Indian state to establish the institution of Lokayukta?

Q.22 Advocate General of the State submits his resignation to:

Q,24 Which one is NOT correct regarding Advocate General of State?

Q.30 The members of the UPSC are appointed by the............. for the term of ......years.

string-array.item: In State of Madras Vs. Champakam Dorairajan
5 years or 65 years, whichever is earlier
It has original and appellate jurisdiction
Chief Judge of high court of the state
He has the right of audience in any Court in the State Legislative

string-array.item: 6 years or 60 years, whichever is earlier
It enjoys the power of judicial review
The Advocate General is the first law officer of a State.

string-array.item: 6 years or 65 years, whichever is earlier
It acts as the court of law
He receives the Pay as per fixation by Government.

string-array.item: In Unna Krishnan vs. State of Andhra Pradesh
5 years or 60 years, whichever is earlier
He has the voting right in the state legislature.

6 years or 65 years, whichever is earlier
